etag.description: Entity tag (ETag) used for optimistic concurrency control as a way to help prevent simultaneous updates from overwriting each other. Used internally during updates.

identities.description: Array of service accounts to grant access to control plane resources, each specified using the following format: 'serviceAccount:service-account-name'. The 'service-account-name' is formatted like an email address. For example: my-synchronizer-manager-serviceAccount@my_project_id.iam.gserviceaccount.com You might specify multiple service accounts, for example, if you have multiple environments and wish to assign a unique service account to each one. The service accounts must have **Apigee Synchronizer Manager** role. See also [Create service accounts](https://cloud.google.com/apigee/docs/hybrid/v1.8/sa-about#create-the-service-accounts).
